author: Meimi Sanchez
description: Most unusual and interesting. Recognisably a Daiquiri but with a creamy mouthfeel and great depth of flavour.
name: Hoyt's Daiquirí
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum

recipeInstructions.text: Sear two halves of lime with a chef's blow torch and squeeze into a shaker
SHAKE all remaining ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
